function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagious diseases among migrant populations due to poor access to healthcare and safe water.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and complications among migrant populations.","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare services, clean water, and adequate housing for migrant populations.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, water purification systems, and sustainable housing solutions.","People":"Migrants, refugees, asylum seekers","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"High prevalence of stress, depression, and anxiety disorders among healthcare professionals due to increased workloadand limited resources.","Impact":"Decreased quality of care for patients and long-term psychological consequences for healthcare professionals.","Mitigation":"Providing adequate support, resources, and mental health services for healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support, resource management software, and stress-reducing technologies.","People":"Healthcare professionals (HCP)","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"}]}
